title: [Large-scale] Creative Economic Development Project-Based Curriculum for Training Community Learning Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Community development theory fundamentals, basic project management competencies, and creative problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for corporate managers/leaders to develop community-linked creative economic models.

learning_goals: Develop three or more community-tailored learning design frameworks using participatory R&D approaches
Derive two or more creative economic development strategies through SWOT analysis and stakeholder workshops
Design and evaluate five or more sustainability assessment indicators via PLACE model application exercises, then compile evaluation reports

Using Google Docs and Miro, learners will complete one learning environment design proposal and one implementation plan per team. They will submit results meeting at least four of five peer evaluation criteria (e.g., creativity, feasibility, collaboration efficiency) within 5 days, demonstrated through an 8-minute presentation and 2-minute Q&A session.

resources: SWOT Analysis Template and Brainstorming Toolkit
Digital Collaboration Platform (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
